description.value:
Your jumping prowess is unmatched. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] up to 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground and without requiring an Athletics check; when doing so, you must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action. You can exceed your normal Speed while Leaping.

Special If you have the Fantastic Leaps feat, the total distance you can Leap horizontally is 40 feet, and the total distance you can Leap vertically is 35 feet.
